Istanbul Turkey the blessing is upon
humanity for this is a time of

facing the difficult and uncertain times
ahead this is the time in which humanity

spirituality a call for its unity and
cooperation and its destiny
both within this world and beyond this
world within a greater community of
intelligent life in the universe for
Humanity has reached a great threshold a
threshold from which there is no turning
back
it is a threshold unlike any threshold
that humanity as a whole has ever
reached before
now you must become a people of a world
not just people of one nation or tribe
or group for you are emerging into a

where all whom you may encounter and all

people of the world here you are

you are entering a competitive
environment in the universe unlike

conduct yourself here how you conduct
your relations with each other how you

have tremendous weight in determining

this greater community will be fulfilled
and even if it can be fulfilled you have
reached the great threshold where you
have the power to destroy the
life-sustaining resources of this world
and to set humanity into a permanent
state of decline you have the power to
compete with each other as you've always
competed to drive Humanity into this
great state of decline and yet you have

out of a dilemma that will only become

what you as part of a larger group and a
larger nation will do will determine
which of these two great choices you
will make if you continue to conduct

your habit then your future is
predictable and as
extremely grave yet if you choose

is to call forth this greater promise it

it extends beyond the human family this
is called a new message from God into

God can contain such a blessing
only it has the power to call forth the
greater wisdom and the greater

has placed within each person there is
no individual there is no philosophy
there is no school of thought that can
generate such a calling it must come
from the creator of all life it must

community the one God the one source
whose angels watch over the world but

each person the seed of knowledge so
that this calling may be responded to
this knowledge is a greater intelligence
within each person waiting to be
discovered
but soul existence is in relationship to
the creator of all life it is not a
resource that you can use for yourself
to enrich yourself or to gain advantage

are to respond to the creator of all

for Humanity this is not an intellectual

recognition
an innate sense of awareness all of
which come from knowledge within them
there's no escaping this great time this

enter this great time this great

blind in self-obsessed you will not be

knowledge within you awaiting the time

its greatest danger and yet it's one

the calling now is going forth a new

it contains the blessing that contains

it is not here to replace the world's

must be necessitated by a greater power

not everyone will have to respond but

to experience this calling and this
response the time is short
it is not time now to become listless or

there is a greater darkness in the world
it is a darkness more profound and more

the world at a time of great
vulnerability for the human family as

the other path the other way will be

but many people are still asleep
dreaming of their own personal

the great waves of change that are

there is an answer for Humanity but it

humanity can invent for itself entirely
for the answer must have the power to

the social and the political ideologies

it is a calling from God and a response

people a response within you therefore

in within yourself honor this response

allow it to lead you forward it is the

it must awaken for the time for its

into the world with clear and objective

keep you weak and blind and vulnerable
this is a time of Revelation such times
only come very rarely at great turning
points for the human family at great

wisdom and knowledge and a new infusion

must be activated by a greater calling
and a greater set of circles
therefore do not shrink from the great

because of the blessing for God is

fulfillment to respond to this great
time to prepare to render the gifts that

within the few years to come this is the

you may pray for the well-being of your

there's no greater response that you

the blessing response to a far greater

the need of your soul it is a
communication far beyond the reach of

it provides for far more than you have

it is a mountain to climb that is the
blessing that is what will rearrange
your life and give it meaning that is
what will organize your thinking and

circumstance will bring the blessing
into your life so that others can see it

rewards into the human family it is only

darkness that is in the world the

disastrous or
stands within the world it is a set of

unless you can see the great challenge
you will not feel the great need if you

what God wills and what people choose

this is what keeps people blind
engendering foolish and destructive

your decisions and your actions must
